introduction.p:
This control template is for <CheckBox/> and <RadioButton/>. It is also used for the following themes:
ListItemBackground: Default item background button, Selected becomes true when an item is selected.
TreeItemExpander: Default tree item expander, Selected becomes true when an item is expanded.
CheckTextListItem: Default check list bullet, Selected becomes true when an item is checked.
RadioTextListItem: Default radio list bullet, Selected becomes true when an item is checked.

prop.name: Selected
prop.p: This property becomes true when the button is selected.
